qas.question: What was the population of Nanjing in 2010?
What was the estimated population of Nanjing in 2011?
How was the population figure for 2010 obtained?
How many people were considered to be living in the urban portion of Nanjing?

context: According to <a2_0>the Sixth China Census<a2_0/>, the total population of the City of Nanjing reached <a0_0>8.005 million<a0_0/> in 2010. The statistics in 2011 estimated the total population to be <a1_0>8.11 million<a1_0/>. The birth rate was <a3_0>8.86 percent<a3_0/> and the death rate was 6.88 percent. The urban area had a population of <a4_0>6.47 million<a4_0/> people. The sex ratio of the city population was 107.31 males to 100 females.
